	doctrine=pagan_hostility_doctrine
	doctrine=doctrine_no_head
	doctrine=doctrine_gender_male_dominated
	doctrine=doctrine_pluralism_righteous
	doctrine=doctrine_theocracy_temporal
	doctrine=doctrine_missionary_not_allowed
	doctrine=doctrine_polygamy
	doctrine=doctrine_divorce_allowed
	doctrine=doctrine_bastardry_legitimization
	doctrine=doctrine_consanguinity_restricted
	doctrine=doctrine_homosexuality_shunned
	doctrine=doctrine_adultery_men_crime
	doctrine=doctrine_adultery_women_crime
	doctrine=doctrine_kinslaying_any_dynasty_member_crime
	doctrine=doctrine_deviancy_crime
	doctrine=doctrine_witchcraft_crime
	doctrine=doctrine_clerical_function_alms_and_pacification
	doctrine=doctrine_clerical_gender_either
	doctrine=doctrine_clerical_marriage_allowed
	doctrine=doctrine_clerical_succession_spiritual_fixed_appointment
	doctrine=doctrine_pilgrimage_encouraged
	doctrine=doctrine_funeral_bewailment
family = rf_pagan
pagan_roots = yes
traits = {
		virtues = { generous forgiving patient twin } #lots of Dinka clans trace their linage to a twin birth between human and animal ie. divine
		sins = { wrathful vengeful greedy }
	}

	}

	doctrine=pagan_hostility_doctrine
	doctrine=doctrine_no_head
	doctrine=doctrine_gender_male_dominated
	doctrine=doctrine_pluralism_righteous
	doctrine=doctrine_theocracy_temporal

		virtues = { stubborn brave just }

idoism_religion={
	doctrine=pagan_hostility_doctrine
	doctrine=doctrine_no_head
	doctrine=doctrine_gender_male_dominated
	doctrine=doctrine_pluralism_pluralistic
	doctrine=doctrine_theocracy_temporal
	doctrine=doctrine_missionary_not_allowed
	doctrine=doctrine_concubines
	doctrine=doctrine_divorce_allowed
	doctrine=doctrine_bastardry_legitimization
	doctrine=doctrine_consanguinity_aunt_nephew_and_uncle_niece
	doctrine=doctrine_homosexuality_shunned
	doctrine=doctrine_adultery_men_crime
	doctrine=doctrine_adultery_women_crime
	doctrine=doctrine_kinslaying_close_kin_crime
	doctrine=doctrine_deviancy_shunned
	doctrine=doctrine_witchcraft_accepted
	doctrine=doctrine_clerical_function_recruitment
	doctrine=doctrine_clerical_gender_either
	doctrine=doctrine_clerical_marriage_disallowed
	doctrine=doctrine_clerical_succession_temporal_appointment
	doctrine=doctrine_pilgrimage_encouraged
	doctrine=doctrine_funeral_bewailment
family = rf_pagan
pagan_roots = yes

		virtues = { generous brave patient }
		sins = { impatient craven greedy }
	}

inuit_religion={
	doctrine=pagan_hostility_doctrine
	doctrine=doctrine_no_head
	doctrine=doctrine_gender_male_dominated
	doctrine=doctrine_pluralism_righteous
	doctrine=doctrine_theocracy_temporal
	doctrine=doctrine_polygamy
	doctrine=doctrine_divorce_allowed
	doctrine=doctrine_bastardry_legitimization
	doctrine=doctrine_consanguinity_cousins
	doctrine=doctrine_homosexuality_shunned
	doctrine=doctrine_adultery_men_shunned
	doctrine=doctrine_adultery_women_shunned
	doctrine=doctrine_kinslaying_close_kin_crime
	doctrine=doctrine_deviancy_shunned
	doctrine=doctrine_witchcraft_accepted
	doctrine=doctrine_clerical_function_recruitment
	doctrine=doctrine_clerical_gender_either
	doctrine=doctrine_clerical_marriage_allowed
	doctrine=doctrine_clerical_succession_temporal_appointment
	doctrine=doctrine_pilgrimage_encouraged
	doctrine=doctrine_funeral_sky_burial
family = rf_pagan
traits = {
		virtues = { brave just generous lifestyle_hunter }
		sins = { craven arbitrary greedy }
	}

shona_religion={
	doctrine=pagan_hostility_doctrine
	doctrine=doctrine_no_head
	doctrine=doctrine_gender_male_dominated
	doctrine=doctrine_pluralism_pluralistic
	doctrine=doctrine_theocracy_temporal
	doctrine=doctrine_concubines
	doctrine=doctrine_divorce_allowed
	doctrine=doctrine_bastardry_legitimization
	doctrine=doctrine_consanguinity_cousins
	doctrine=doctrine_homosexuality_shunned
	doctrine=doctrine_adultery_men_crime
	doctrine=doctrine_adultery_women_crime
	doctrine=doctrine_kinslaying_close_kin_crime
	doctrine=doctrine_deviancy_shunned
	doctrine=doctrine_witchcraft_accepted
	doctrine=doctrine_clerical_function_alms_and_pacification
	doctrine=doctrine_clerical_gender_male_only
	doctrine=doctrine_clerical_marriage_allowed
	doctrine=doctrine_clerical_succession_temporal_appointment
	doctrine=doctrine_pilgrimage_encouraged
	doctrine=doctrine_funeral_bewailment
family = rf_pagan
pagan_roots = yes
traits = {
		virtues = { forgiving generous compassionate }
		sins = { wrathful callous sadistic }

khasi_religion={
	doctrine=pagan_hostility_doctrine
	doctrine=doctrine_no_head
	doctrine=doctrine_gender_equal
	doctrine=doctrine_pluralism_pluralistic
	doctrine=doctrine_theocracy_lay_clergy
	doctrine=doctrine_monogamy
	doctrine=doctrine_divorce_allowed
	doctrine=doctrine_bastardry_none
	doctrine=doctrine_consanguinity_cousins
	doctrine=doctrine_homosexuality_shunned
	doctrine=doctrine_adultery_men_crime
	doctrine=doctrine_adultery_women_crime
	doctrine=doctrine_kinslaying_any_dynasty_member_crime
	doctrine=doctrine_deviancy_shunned
	doctrine=doctrine_witchcraft_shunned
	doctrine=doctrine_clerical_function_alms_and_pacification
	doctrine=doctrine_clerical_gender_male_only
	doctrine=doctrine_clerical_marriage_allowed
	doctrine=doctrine_clerical_succession_temporal_appointment
	doctrine=doctrine_pilgrimage_encouraged
	doctrine=doctrine_funeral_stoic
family = rf_pagan
graphical_faith = pagan_gfx
pagan_roots = yes
traits = {
		virtues = { temperate content honest patient }
		sins = { lustful lazy deceitful }

	doctrine=doctrine_no_head
	doctrine=doctrine_gender_male_dominated

	doctrine=doctrine_funeral_stoic

	}
